title: Game of Thrones S04E03 [CENSORED] - 720p
description:
Yes, it's what it sounds like. This is game of thrones censored. All of the nudity and sex scenes are removed, although everything else is left intact. ___________________________________________________________________________

Video Details:

File Name            : Game of Thrones - S04E03 - Breaker of Chains.mp4
File Type            : MP4
File Size            : 567 MB
Video Resolution     : 1280 x 720 pixels
Video Frame-rate     : 23
Video Data Rate      : 1065kbps
Video Total Bit-rate : 1449kbps
Video Length         : 54:29
Audio Bit-rate       : 383kbps
Audio Channels       : 6
Audio Sample Rate    : 48 kHz


What was censored this episode: 
Cropped out some girls in brothel scene.
Cut some nudity and skipped most of the part with all the people in the bed.
Cropped some nudity at the end with the soldier taunting them.
___________________________________________________________________________________

Here's links to the other seasons:

Seasons 1 + 2 Censored       : http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7467436/

DISCLAIMER

Although I edited out all the nudity, there is still lots of swearing left, sexual references, and violence. Keep that in mind if you are thinking of showing this show to your children. This show was not made for children, and even without the nudity it is still a very adult show.
___________________________________________________________________________________

[------------------------------------Quick FAQ------------------------------------]

Why would someone want this?

-If they did not watch the series since they didn't want to watch the nudity and sex.
-If they want to watch it with a friend or family member who does not want to watch the nudity and sex.
___________________________________________________________________________________

Why did you do this?

-I wanted to watch this show with some friends, but they heard about all the excessive sex and nudity, and didn't want any part of it. I decided to censor it for them, so they could enjoy the show like I have. Since I already did it, I thought I might as well upload it for other people to benefit.
___________________________________________________________________________________

Wouldn't censoring this leave holes in the story?

-Yes, that is why I have kept most of the scenes, even the ones with nudity mostly intact. If the scene has no story purposes, I just edit it out. If it is important to the story, I just crop out the nudity bits.

So, you can still get all the action without the "action".
___________________________________________________________________________________

How did you edit this/what did you use?

-I first use XMedia Recode to remux the original MKV file to MP4. Then I edit it in Premiere Pro and export it to a large file size. Finally, I use Handbrake to compress it to a reasonable file size.
___________________________________________________________________________________

I think that this is a horrible thing to do, and you are a bad person for uploading this to the internet.

-That isn't a question.	
___________________________________________________________________________________

Note: If I perhaps missed something you think I should of censored, comment explaining what I missed and I'll re-upload the episode if it's something I think should be censored.
